abstract: Defense lawyers for Army Sgt Bowe Bergdahl say he was diagnosed with severe psychological problems at time he left base in Afghanistan in 2009; revelation comes on first day in Bergdahl's military court-martial on charges of desertion; Bergdahl faces possibility of life in prison.
lead_paragraph: Officials should have known Sgt. Bowe Bergdahl was unfit for combat when he left his Afghanistan base in 2009, the lawyer suggested at an Army hearing.

headline.main: Bowe Bergdahl Had ‘Severe Mental Disease or Defect,’ Lawyer Says
headline.print_headline: Bergdahl Had ‘Severe Mental Disease or Defect,’ Lawyer Says at Hearing
